html:
5.29.23  7:52 pm   I tried so hard and got so far, but in the end, it doesn't even matter. What now? 

      try rapping out some of your woes during the verses

5.29.23  6:24 pm   Will some of the videos be set in a fictional location not based on anywhere in the real world?

      that will occasionally happen, but, like real live action cinematography, it is more rewarding to play 'location scout' and find real locations, even before the writing, so i know what i have to work with

5.29.23  5:41 pm   Are you ok

      yes

5.29.23  5:16 pm   do you make good music

      i'll see what i can do

5.29.23  4:07 pm   I'm thinking about taking a trip into the future,

     that already happens naturally

     though I'm scared of what might happen If I don't make it. Will everything still be there?

     some things change gradually

5.29.23  11:51 am   what do you consider as "perfection"

      if anything were perfect, then it would never change. it would stay exactly the same forever in that perfect way. but i think it's clear to see that nobody wants this

5.29.23  7:50 am   do you like blue pillows

      yes

5.29.23  5:16 am   how do i make my car go slower (its too fast)

      shrink the wheels

5.28.23  11:31 pm   my window is broken what do i do

      you can do anything

5.28.23  9:42 pm   is blue blue or is blue red

      let me perform some calculations

5.28.23  9:31 pm   What's your favorite food?

      water

5.28.23  9:18 pm   is it a smart idea to start a ludicrously large archive of everything cool i come across on the internet?

      yes

5.28.23  8:09 pm   do you ever use any silly names for your tracks/layers in daw or animation software?

      no

5.28.23  7:55 pm   What's your favorite song made by you?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.28.23  6:20 pm   what is the superior fruit

      big. the big fruit

5.28.23  3:55 pm   Is there any particular reason you have to capitalize song titles on iTunes? There are tons of songs there now that have no capitalization whatsoever 

      well then i guess i'm just not high enough on the social ladder

5.28.23  1:47 pm   is there a Bill Wurtz Cinematic Universe?

     i wouldn't call it that

     If so, is it called the BCU?

     no

5.28.23  1:16 pm   any tips on staying motivated? i still have exams left, but i've completely run out of motivation to study now that i only have 2 weeks left until summer

      i guess you just have to figure out what they mean to you, and why they are important to you. if they truly are unimportant to you, then you can't expect to be motivated

5.28.23  11:51 am   do you have the answers

      i have some of them, but then they change. i appreciate this, because then i get to have the joy of finding them again

5.28.23  11:43 am   how did you come up with the script for "Perfect"

      i randomly selected a real world location, which turned out to be a parking lot in a retail plaza. then i imagined 2 characters sitting on one of the small curb islands, watching cars trading places in a strange way and contemplating why. then everything else unfolded naturally from there, strictly according to cold hard common sense

5.28.23  10:09 am   Will you ever incorporate a tree into a song as a musical instrument?

I love you 

      it's possible that i would use paper for a sound. actually i just realized drum sticks are certainly made from trees so the answer is yes

5.28.23  8:51 am   Is Cmaj13#11 one of the most complex chords?

      that particular chord seems to me like a "ghost of the textbook". this chord appears in music textbooks but just doesn't seem to get used in the real world. so that's what distracts me from your question. also we have to consider the fact that just writing a chord symbol doesn't really specify how complex the chord is, because there can be a quite simple or complex version of almost any chord symbol

5.28.23  6:58 am   who is your target audience for your music?

      you

5.28.23  6:39 am   Is it better to try and help what people we can by volunteering time and resources to charities or does engaging with these systems inherently support and further entrench systems of inequality since these charities are often invested in maintaining the status quo?

      i'm not entirely sure

5.28.23  5:59 am   Why does the letter g look like that?

      because everything is absolutely out-of-control

5.28.23  12:27 am   What do you value the most in life?

      for the ranking of values to be able to occasionally change their order

5.27.23  10:57 pm   How are your goals with cinema similar to your goals with music,

     want to express things

     and also in what ways are they different?

      i'm not sure

5.27.23  9:05 pm   While improvising, is there a specific way to get better at forming melodic lines rather than just playing random notes and arpeggios in the minor blues scale?

      sure, that actually sounds like a terrible way. i would recommend thinking of it this way: each moment in time is like a multi-prong multi-directional fork in the timeline of your life. to start off, just sit there and enjoy the ridiculous view

5.27.23  8:37 pm   what key is the rabbit ringtone in?

      B

5.27.23  6:27 pm   would you like to **** a ****** *** until you ***** in the ********?

      i'm not sure

5.27.23  6:09 pm   what gender are the friends on the beach,

     it doesn't seem to matter

     are you going to make more people like them?

     sure

5.27.23  3:37 pm   Do you have a pet?

      no

5.27.23  2:14 pm   Can I make a chair out of a chair

      yes you can

5.27.23  11:20 am   T'as les cramptés ?

      no

5.27.23  10:55 am   am i a beef dumpling

      yes and no

5.27.23  10:48 am   1...2...3...4...5...6...

      i think i see where you're going with this

5.27.23  9:58 am   why are you so good

      defense mechanism

5.27.23  9:19 am   how many time you wanna travel?

      couple

5.27.23  9:19 am   tips to stop worrying too much?

      yes. go ahead and worry about everything. just get all the worrying done

5.27.23  9:12 am   at the very beginning of 2 friends on a beach, be can see that guys on painting talking to each other and second later we see that they are the picture. did you make a separate scene inside picture frame, or it was just a cool transition made by video editing?

      it's most likely a flat video render placed in the picture frame and then paused

5.27.23  7:40 am   do you enjoy the challenge of writing lyrics that work? kinda like figuring out a puzzle to make them and the music work together

      sure, but sometimes if you're trying to make sure something 'works' it will lead you to nowhere. so it's also a nice challenge to find something that really takes you somewhere

5.27.23  7:30 am   is the US going to run out of money?

      they have an extra 100 dollars buried in kansas somewhere

5.27.23  6:29 am   how do i play the notes i hear in my head? i've been able to sort of imagine a melody in my head over other songs for a while, but i can't play them on a keyboard or even sing it out loud. is it like chords in the way that eventually i can write them down like words in my head?

      yes

5.27.23  6:07 am   do you like lemons?

      no, but that doesn't mean they aren't good

5.27.23  4:16 am   why do we exist

      to break things and then fix them

5.27.23  1:21 am   How do you know what you know?

      it's contagious

5.27.23  12:54 am   if you could make any factory what would it produce?

      anything

5.27.23  12:33 am   hey bill, my money keeps running away from my wallet. how do I prevent my money from escaping.

      put the wallet inside a larger wallet

5.27.23  12:16 am   hows progress

      pretty good

5.26.23  11:50 pm   favorite color

      average
